website_summaries.verdict: This innovative vacuum can suck up even the toughest debris without anything getting back into the air.
pros: Vacuum self-rights when it falls over
Releases dirt easily with no need to reach inside the canister
Ball technology makes it easy to maneuver and turn
Picks up fine dust and ground-in debris
cons: This vacuum is pricey and may be more than some people can afford

website_summaries.verdict: With self-righting ball design, allergy-friendly HEPA filter, and extremely strong suction, this model makes it easy to clean your floors and improve your air quality at the same time.
pros: Powerful suction catches microscopic dirt and dust particles
The ball is easy to maneuver in tight spaces
Empty debris at the press of a button
cons: The Big Ball is as fantastic as it is pricey

website_summaries.verdict: Forget the issues you've previously had with canister models – if you can afford it, this lightweight and powerful vacuum has great suction and is easy to use.
pros: An excellent canister vac that, unlike competitors in its class, self-adjusts against toppling and works almost effortlessly around furniture, walls, and other obstacles
cons: Expensive for a canister vacuum, but it's a top-of-the-line model

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design = useless vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This really is an awful vacuum. The beater brush spins ridiculously fast and as a result the machine is not only loud it blows as much dirt away from the head as it manages to suck up. The brushes are also useless on low pile rugs. I have vacuumed over the same piece of lint several times without it getting removed.
customer_reviews.author: CFG

customer_reviews.title: Broke after second use. Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum. However it gets one star. The second time I used my new Dyson - the cord will NOT retract. Very disappointed. I think it's fare to say a vacuum that is in a high price group; would not break in it's second use .. again this is disappointing
customer_reviews.author: DanRich

customer_reviews.title: I had a small problem with the product.
customer_reviews.text: About a month after purchasing the vacuum through Amazon, JAY-tech+more, the fuzzy piece on the rear soleplate came off the adhesive track and wrapped around the brush head. I contacted Dyson as I had already registered my product and warranty. Apparently this third-party seller is not eligible for the warranty. The replacement part is under $10. But that's not the point, I've had this under a month. If I had known that the warranty would not be covered through Dyson anymore I would have bought directly through the company not Amazon and jaytech.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more and buy upright
customer_reviews.text: I owned several dyson but this one gets 1 star. The brush is small, the suction is weird and it takes a lot of effort to move it back and forth, it feels like driving a car without power steering!! . For all those that like the fresh vacuum look this is definitely NOT FOR YOU, and it might not be for me, i will try it 1 more time and if Im still not happy is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Chaka  Khach Kornelli

customer_reviews.title: All hype
customer_reviews.text: Yes this is like lugging around a bowling ball. It is heavy. Doing stairs is a nightmare. Scratched my wood floor while it pushed dirt instead of sucking it up. Won’t store as shown, the plastic clasps aren’t strong enough to hold the two pieces. While I picked it up to dump the dirt it immediately dropped all over the vacuum and floor. The plastic pieces are hard to clasp together, so there’s immediate wear and tear. The retractable cord works only on level surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Works great temporarily
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a year and then the metal filter inside formed a dust around it every few rooms I vacuumed. It’s not the filter you wash (which I do often), its the large tube like metal insertion that has little holes in it. I have to stop vacuuming and wipe the film of dust off of it many times while vacuuming the house. If I don’t do that, there is no suction. I’ve decided to go back to my old brand with a bag. Hope Dyson fixes all the faults with this including the cheap clip that holds the dust in that others write about.
customer_reviews.author: barbwire

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, this was the wrong choice for me
customer_reviews.text: This machine vacuums floors and rugs just fine, but almost any vacuum will work on a floor anyway. When it comes to carpet with a bit of pile, and I'm not talking about shag or super plush, it cleans up what's lying on top but doesn't reach below or into the pile or brush up the pile like most carpet vacuums will do. Now I need 2 machines to get my floors done. My older canister has a carpet head attachment that worked well on the carpet and the floor attachment cleaned the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Learning curb but best dyson out of 3
customer_reviews.text: I have two other dysons, two uprights one animal which is very heavy to push and carry. When I first got this one I had a hard time pushing it and I was going to send it back, even thou, I thought the suction was incredible. So I took it back out of the box and I extended the long arm extension as far as it could go, and walla it was much easier to push, and I love this vacuum. I'm so glad I decided to give the much deserve attention that it needed. If you like a canister vac, and that's what I had growing up... give this a go....
customer_reviews.author: Terry B.

customer_reviews.title: Dead Dyson and Zero support
customer_reviews.text: It work well for the three times I used it. On the third, the bin won't reconnect to the vacuum. It makes me sad since this is my first terrible experience with a Dyson (and the return period just passed). If this ugly paperweight is any indication their future looks grim.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha A.Top Contributor: Quilting

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought i’d say that i’m In love with a vacuum but I am!! This is a dream! I tested on tile, on wood, on an area run, carpet and stairs ... and I was shocked at how much MORE it pulled up than my old Dyson! It was easy to assemble and came with very useful attachments ... am on a cleaning frenzy! It is easy to use and it is everything I hoped a vacuum to be and more. It passed all my tests in flying colors! This is love!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: If you like plastic this is the vacuum for you
customer_reviews.text: For an expensive vacuum this is very cheaply made. For instance, there are only two small plastic tabs that hold the bottom of the dust bin part in place and if those get broken, which is very easy to do, the bottom of the bin falls out and all the stuff you vacuumed up empties out onto your floor or carpet. So I guess duct tape is in order. Practically the whole thing is plastic. The design is very good and its comfortable to use and quite small. I wish it were sturdier and made of quality materials. Can't see it lasting long. Won't buy another Dyson product.
customer_reviews.author: M. James

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Dyson Product
customer_reviews.text: Love Dyson products! This is my second Dyson purchase (the first was the Dyson Animal Upright that I purchased 8+ years ago... I love it and it still works wonderfully). I like that the Dyson Big Ball maneuvers wonderfully under furniture, and cleans great on hard floor surfaces without adjusting/adding attachments., esp. in corners and along walls. The big ball adjusts itself nicely when tiping over, and it follows well (not too many getting stuck on walls/furniture situations)
customer_reviews.author: tSt

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure I'd like this and as several reviews suggest
customer_reviews.text: Over several years, I've owned the original dyson, the Ball, and the Ball for pets...at first, I wasn't sure I'd like this and as several reviews suggest, you need more hand attachments. However, as others have said, this thing really sucks!! very impressive and easier to get into tight spots with, vs the Ball. I love that I can completely clean underneath beds and other large furniture very easily. If I were to buy ONE vacuum cleaner for a townhouse, condo, apartment or office, this is the one for me!
customer_reviews.author: miket

customer_reviews.title: Superior suction, but minor problems as well.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dyson vacuum. The first was specifically for animal hair; I think the model was the C39. The new one has even more suction, and it's much easier to empty and reattach to the machine. However, because it lies flatter, the dirt settles at the back and stops swirling around, so it's impossible to see how full it is. The container also seems smaller, so I have to empty it more often.
customer_reviews.author: CJinVA

customer_reviews.title: Having a Ball vacuuming
customer_reviews.text: Love the new Dyson Ball... our old Dyson gave us many years of great service. The Ball has much better suction power.... only complaint is the on/off switch. It is smaller and harder to use with a press of the foot. Our old one had big round button that was easy to press with your toe. Do like that we were able to use some of our old attachments on the new vacuum because it included an converting attachment to make that happen.
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: Dyson is not what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an older Dyson that was ten years old. This has good suction power but Dyson changed the motor head. It’s very light and just bounces on carpet. Also head is much smaller and requires multiple passes and still doesn’t do a great job. Lastly the vacuum now has multiple pieces to attach various attachments. So you can’t just replace one attachment for the other without using a different connector. Not too mention you can’t store all the connectors and attachments on the vacuum. So pieces will eventually be missed placed. Net is Dyson is not what it used to be.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum! I am a canister person.... some people are not. I like the fact that this moves around so easily - the attachments are right on the handle, and it's easy to attach and detach switching from small nozzles to floor cleaners easily. The suction is amazing - picks up stuff I never even saw! Cord length could be a little longer, but it works. I was a little unsure of buying one for the price, but ... well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance by Dyson
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Dyson vacuum that I have purchased and I'm sorry to say that I am quite disappointed. The product performs very poorly and I've had them send me replacement parts twice and now it is not working again for the 3rd time. I figured with the Dyson name and performance I've come to expect from their products that this $300 vacuum would be terrific, but I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: lh

customer_reviews.title: Constantly gets stuck on corners and furniture
customer_reviews.text: Given that this vacuum cleaner is made to be dragged behind you it is extremely frustrating to use due to the fact that it constantly gets stuck on corners and furniture, you have to unhook it about ten times during a vacuuming session. See the attached pictures. This is a design flaw that can not be fixed, I'll be returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: Ettienne Hugo

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like this vacuum. It is incredible loud, and the pitch is high. One of the wheel cover fell off after a few uses. Have to be very mindful to close the canister properly after releasing the dust. A few times the contents spilled all over vacuum upon lifting the canister out.
customer_reviews.author: Konsumgesellschaftskind

customer_reviews.title: Dysons Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Ive had the Dyson Big Ball with the rotary head attachment for 7months. It started making a terrible noise, I called and they said no warranty on that part, it costs $80.00, Ive only had it 7mos. After complaining that I paid $499.00 for the Dyson, theres no way I'm paying for a part that went out after only 7 months. They agreed to give me a replacement at no charge. Thanks,
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t vacuum much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one and another handy one. Dyson vacuum cleaners don’t vacuum dust which size is around grain of rice. Always, this flicks the dust behind, and you feel the flicked dust on your feet. I’m so disappointed. Also the handle doesn’t have power button, so you have to go back to the “ball” to turn off every time when you need to. And you breath in dust when you empty the bin. Japanese vacuum cleaners which I was used to use in Japan were much better.
customer_reviews.author: Tk

customer_reviews.title: Fantasic vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Wood floors, ceramic floor, carpet different types. It is fantastic. Cord length is a God sent, suction on the floors picks up everything, on door mats I couldn't believe the amount dirt that came out. LOVE the push button release, place the canister in garbage can and no more in the air, and nothing on you. The extension wand with adaptors are great no more getting a latter to dust crown moldings, or ceiling fan blades. Great for getting under and behind furniture. Thank you Amazon for having the best price on this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: susan torres

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking, this is not a vacuum you want.
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst vacuums I have ever used. It sucks to vacuum a rug with it. For all but 500 dollars I expect a much better product. This was my first and last Dyson product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: This makes vacuuming easy. I have 2 large dogs that shed, and the light weight ball is easy to move around and get into tight places. It fills quick, so I empty it often, but it’s not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Terisa Lingafelter

customer_reviews.title: Dyson could and should do better for this vac!
customer_reviews.text: Plastic parts around the vulnerable areas makes one too cautious when using the vacuum. The dirt release mechanism is poorly designed... its actually not easy to place back the lid into the canister. I can see the plastic latch breaking off in a few months. Sad that Dyson engineering didn't think of durability when they designed the latching mechanism for the dirt canister! Who ever thought, hmmm let's make it out of plastic at Dyson doesn't vacuum regularly nor understand that this part is actually one of the most important part of the vaccum! Imagine this plastic latch breaking off?! That is the end of use for this expensive vac! Come on Dyson!
customer_reviews.author: ADEWALE IYANOYE

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy when I got this
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when I got this!! It was just what I wanted, unfortunately it didn’t last a month before problems started and now the button you push that pulls the cord in doesn’t work either... I’ve always used Dyson but I think it’s time for a change when a product this expensive can’t last a month! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Dana Thompson

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I took it out of the box, plugged it in and cleaned my ceiling and the fans. Cant do that with a standard upright. Then I cleaned my dryer. Cant do that with a robot vac. This is the 2nd best vacuum I have ever owned. I am very happy with this vac. It is easy to maneuver and can vacuum anything from floor to ceiling even the dog.
customer_reviews.author: l

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum, works well. It is a lot easier to push just the hose and wand instead of the entire machine. Much easier on my back. The cord is about 20' long. Minor dislikes: The slide on catch that holds the hose when parked is a bit flimsy. The levers that turn on the machine and retract the cord seems a little light duty. They are very convenient to push with your foot but I am afraid if I lose my balance I could push too hard and break one off.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: wish it had bags!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this powerful cleaner, it is a little strong for carpets, but there is an air release button that makes it more doable, but my vents, kick board, and wooden floors are the cleanest they have ever been, I am elderly and as it is a canister puts no strain on my back, I do recommend this vac, I rate it above my kirby.
customer_reviews.author: Gail F.

customer_reviews.title: Best for hard floors!
customer_reviews.text: I am a housecleaned by profession. I use this on all hard floors and sometimes for dusting. It came with so many attachments I haven't used all of them. But the horsehair is awesome. And when I have a large or medium area rug I use the roller brush attachment. My favorite vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: TCP

customer_reviews.title: Whistles like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Cleans well - Great feature on the cord keeper - Not too heavy Cons: - Whistles loudly - Doesn't always pick up larger crumbs (like small dog food size) - Can't turn off beater bar We went with a Dyson for the reputation, we went with a canister because of the versatility. It gets the job done, but you have to deal with a very high-pitched annoying whistle for most of the vacuuming job. I would give this vacuum 5 stars and a solid recommendation of it weren't for the obnoxious whistle. I also noticed that it has a hard time with larger crumbs and you can't turn off the beater bar.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Works well for pet hair on hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.text: Picks up all of the dog hair in the house! We have hardwood bamboo flooring throughout the house. Gave it a 4 because it is hard to vacuum middle steps on staircase, and you need to have area rugs held down so they don’t get sucked into the vacuum. Otherwise, product is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Welchma

customer_reviews.title: Sucks well needs more thought on the wand and head
customer_reviews.text: Great suction I don't like that the vacuum wand and head does not free stand. Also the vacuum head is small and does not maneuver well
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Best Dyson vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: I had few generations of Dyson, all great products. But that one is the of the best. Powerful, quiet, easy to use and fun to clean up with. Must have if any carpet at home.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Dyson vacuums are wonderful this particular one is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Return to this what a disappointment I love Dyson's I was shocked at how poor the quality of this vacuum was maybe I got a lemon but it couldn't even suck up rice so good luck using it to actually clean your home returned it immediately
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hemingway

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum cleaner is made to vacuum a small apartment, not a house!
customer_reviews.text: The machine is way too light! The vacuum head bounces across the carpet it is so light weight. This is a pretty expensive vacuum cleaner for the terrible job it does. I would be willing to sell the one I have for half price and cut my losses!
customer_reviews.author: Loxoceles

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Just received our product today! Super easy to put together:) I used it right away and absolutely love it! The house is about half carpet and half hard floors. Worked great for both! This is my second canister vacuum. My last was an upright and I hated it for use on the hard floors. This one gets very close to the edges of the walls so I didn’t have to go back with an attachment around all the baseboards!!! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a vac that was a canister style but lightweight and easy to maneuver, as well as function with good suction. This one checks all the boxes, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Donnre

customer_reviews.title: Dyson wins in the humans vs. fur war
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my hardwood floors without scratching. The brush is really soft. The cord could be longer, this will only do one room before you have to replug it or get out the extension cord. This is my third Dyson and I like not having to remove the hair as frequently from the brush as in prior models. We have three large long-haired dogs and three cats (1 long hair). The vacuum is probably the most important appliance I own, and this Dyson does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Not for elderly people or weaker strength
customer_reviews.text: It works good on wood floors and flat surfaces. Once u get on a rug it's very hard to move even with the trigger that let's some suction out when it gets hard. If you older and not as strong this vacuum isn't for you but it does the trick and my wife likes it for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch

customer_reviews.title: This is an EXCELLENT vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this thing, the suction is wonderful, it rolls easy, it is easy to empty. The cord retractor actually works the way it should not like on some vacuum cleaners I've had. They delivered it within the time promised. I will definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Only for bare floors
customer_reviews.text: This is the most difficult vacuum to manage. The suction is so strong it doesn’t roll smoothly on carpet or area rugs. It’s fine for wood floors but that’s it. Thankfully I can return it!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Mills

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Really has tremendous suction power. Love using the tools with this canister, which doesn’t restrict arm movement when cleaning-it follows along with easy. Not as noisy as my upright vacuum. It does take a few minutes to get accustomed to adjusting the suction power on carpeting but that is not a problem. I really do enjoy this vacuum—it’s like a faithful little puppy following me around. Also purchased the additional tools which make so many different cleaning tasks easier.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: I use this for hardwood floors. Ot has awesome suction. The only drawback is that i had to huy an attachment for vacuuming hardwood floors because this vacuum comes only with the the caroet atrachment. Thats why the 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is my second canister dyson vacuum that I have bought. The first one lasted for years. I absolutely love the suction and the size of the vacuum is easy to carry around and easy for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love pretty much everything about this vacuum. The attachments connect right to the wand, I don't have to go looking for them. Never thought my carpets were dirty until I vacuumed with my new Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Versatile & powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Dyson and I'm still using the first one. I like the versatility of the cannister and it's easier for me to use since heart surgery. I continue to be amazed how much dirt and dust is picked up every time I clean.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I have a small apartment, around 600 sq. feet, this little vacuum cleaner is really nice. It transitions really well from hardwood to area rugs. It maneuvers well and does not make too much noise. It also stores really well. Some people said they had trouble when they attempted to empty it, but I have not. I purchased mine on sale and it is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Wescott

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The latch on the canister broke within a few months and after a few months the vacuum had little suction. It does maneuver well around furniture. I ended up buying a different vacuum within 6 months. This product was not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: relentless suction
customer_reviews.text: My Dyson is as advertised, heavy and loud. The suction is so strong that I have to decrease it to vacuum my rugs. The best feature is the articulating floor tool, which I had to buy seperately. It is designed for hard to reach spaced, under furniture and along the wall and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Paula J. Mertens

customer_reviews.title: This thing has a VACUUM!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pulls dirt off the floor great! Well thought out design for the most part. Folks complaining about a latch. It is plastic to save weight. Take it easy on it!!! Help the latch out do not slam the canister on the vac. Get the attachments worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: GibsonPicker77

customer_reviews.title: Worst of the worst
customer_reviews.text: Run. Run far away. This has to be the worst vacuum I have ever owned. If all your going to do is suck up spider webs and dust then get this vacuum. If you want to vacuum floors or carpet. Buy a different vacuum. Carry on...
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst vacuums I’ve ever used. It’s constantly missing stuff even after I’ve gone over the area 2-3 times. The suction is not what’s made out to be. I have to go over my LOW pile carpet several times and it STILL MISSES THE HAIR. It’s supposed to be a multi floor tool and it’s terrible on carpet. It does not glide smoothly over carpet. I should have went with the Kenmore canister or the Shark lift away. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: ashley oppelt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic machine!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible suction, great maneuverability, and a very long cord. Very easy to put together, and easy to remove and empty the canister. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks!
customer_reviews.text: It really does, a lot! Very impressed with suction, very mobile, and comparatively quiet. My only complaint is that the brush head is powered by suction, the brush head does an ok job, but lacks the power on plush carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Door to collection cylinder doesn’t always latch
customer_reviews.text: This is my second dyson. I love that this one is less bulky and generally easier to maneuver. My issue is that when you dump the cylinder the door is hard to close (doesn’t usually close the first time) and tends to dump residue everywhere. I have to wipe down the vacuum and vacuum a patch of the floor again every time I dump the cylinder.
customer_reviews.author: corinne a sommer

customer_reviews.title: Not up to Dyson quality
customer_reviews.text: This shouldn’t be in the Dyson lineup. It’s not engineered well at all. It only works well in our rooms with even carpet. We have textured rugs and tile that aren’t cleaned well. The suction is less effective than on my old animal model. Replaced it already.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Heying

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this device is perfect, plus you can sign up on the manufacturer's website for support and updates, as well as warranty. It's the only vacuum we've purchased for church that is yet to break down
customer_reviews.author: Lovesense25

customer_reviews.title: Item used and damaged
customer_reviews.text: This item was used. I paid for a new vacuum not a filthy, used one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. Tile floors through my home with minimal throw rugs and it works great! We also have two dogs so there’s lots of hair and the dyson picks up everything. I can vaccum under my sectional and under my bathroom vanities. Love If I had to add anything I’d want a light on the head of the sweeper and the cord a tad longer.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Schraw

customer_reviews.title: it's a Dyson but I needed something a bit more portable and easy to drag over the carpet
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's a Dyson but I needed something a bit more portable and easy to drag over the carpet. I would not say it is for heavy duty like the larger ones and this one you have to put a little more elbow behind it but I use it upstairs so it works for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia F.

customer_reviews.title: Great - except for carpet
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is better than any other I have owned in terms of suction power. However, it isn't great on carpet. The suction power is fine on carpet, but there is no weight in the arm and so there is more effort required to provide that weight.
customer_reviews.author: Julie W

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but well worth it..
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing.... It sucks..... Very powerful..... Easy to clean roller, and dust collector....
customer_reviews.author: Calvin P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! I have a cat that hides under furniture and with an upright vacuum I could not vacuum there, but with Dyson ball I do it so easily! And vacuumimg the stairs it's not a hassle anymore! Its lightweight and the suction is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum ever ! Well thought out, awesome maneuverability, great suction. Replacing my 13 year old Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: SMH

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum cleaner. Has great suction, pulls easily, uprights itself if it turns over while plugged in and the waste canister is easy to dump. The wand is adjustable for different height operators. Only complaint is that the hose and cord are both a little short.
customer_reviews.author: Arlen

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to use. Well designed.
customer_reviews.text: I had a dyson upright for 10 years, and it worked great but was very loud and heavy. This canister vac is much quieter and works great on floors and carpet. Dyson's products are well designed, easy to use, and canister bin is very easy to empty. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Worst dyson
customer_reviews.text: Put in the basement does not clean hard surface floors just sprays the dirt and there is no hard floor attachment I own 3 other Dysons this is the worst and very sorry I spent so much for it
customer_reviews.author: STONEY BUMGARNER

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bit hesitant to purchase this item due to the cost, but my husband convinced me to buy it. But after using it one time, I fell in love! It's super easy to maneuver, carry, and clean it out! It left my car, spotless!
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum I have ever owned. Very very easy to put together, very easy to handle and very light. I love the disposal of the collected dust and dirt. Very easy to control. Wish the handle would connect to the canister better, but I love this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Leili

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Get’s clogged every time I use it. It’s heavy and cumbersome to use. Roller attachment got permanently clogged and had to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: kjoann

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum! Replaced a Dyson upright with this one, and I am so thrilled. It’s a little tough to vacuum shag carpeting with it, but otherwise, a wonderful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small canister
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t like about this vacuum is you have to empty the small canister a lot!
customer_reviews.author: BuckeyeGin

customer_reviews.title: More suction than most cleaners
customer_reviews.text: Only downside, this has so much suction it isn’t good for carpet. But the best ever fir hardwood floors!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Demro

customer_reviews.title: It vacuums good
customer_reviews.text: Like many of us, I often have bad experiences with products and services. This product is especially refreshing because you take it out to vacuum stuff, and then it vacuums stuff, and then you put it away and cross vacuuming off your list. No fighting with the machine or deep sighs of unmet expectations.
customer_reviews.author: gigs

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for people with bad backs
customer_reviews.text: Love that this vacuum has great power and suction and I love that there is no forceful pushing or pulling involved that can be needed for standard upright models.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cue

customer_reviews.title: Happy With Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs & this vacuum is pretty powerful!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: This vacumme sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this vacumme. Purchased from Warehouse Deals. Works great on floor as well as carpet. So easy to empty. Really sucks up dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Andree

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase but not the delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great buy and great vacuum. The only very big issue was the vacuum was delivered in its original box. Everyone driving by could see a $500 vacuum was sitting in my front porch. Thank goodness I was at home when it was delivered. Otherwise it would have not lasted long sitting in plain view. The delivery truck was not an Amazon one. I wonder why Amazon did not put the item inside of a brown box.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara wurtz

customer_reviews.title: Does not get edges without switching attachments
customer_reviews.text: Does not get edges at all. My Kenmore canister I replaced was excellent at edges. Have to go around a room with crevice tool to get edges. Also not good at picking up larger, bigger than a penny, items. Takes a few passes. Excellent at small particle pick up. Very easy to use. Lightweight for portability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roller
customer_reviews.text: the vacuum cleaner is good when the dust collector empty, as it fills up the suction power reduces and the roller stops to work. This happens starting 1/4th level of the dust collector. Also the roller are not hard to clean the carper properly. May be good for hard floor.
customer_reviews.author: Srilu

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: Its 75% plastic BUT strong motor and quality is just great, worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great working and well made. Would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT NEW
customer_reviews.text: I’m not even opening this box as I can clearly see it has been opened and taped back up maybe a few times. I bought a new one. This is unacceptable. I will be returning it and trying to get a NEW one.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy if you have various levels of carpet.
customer_reviews.text: Great suction until you hit carpeting. The brush stopped turning because it couldn't make it through the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction strength
customer_reviews.text: no suction power!!!! very disappointing for Dyson...........had the Dyson animal when i had 2 dogs.......now we do not have any dogs and this model does not even pick up household dirt.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Great vaccuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Has great suction power and easy to operate. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Barb Bond

customer_reviews.title: Can’t find replacement filters
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is I have tried to order a replacement filters and nobody has them I like to have extra filters on hand
customer_reviews.author: P. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Maneuvers easily and good suction
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum! Easy and convenient to use and good suction.
customer_reviews.author: A Hase

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well.
customer_reviews.text: I vacuumed with my new Dyson after using my oils machine, and the amount of dirt that came up was amazing!! The directions were difficult to follow for assembly and use, but I finally figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Penny B

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and sounds cheap
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 Dyson vacuums. I needed to replace one and ordered this one. Not satisfied at all! I will have to consider another brand the next time i'm ready for replacing a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: vaiva pack

customer_reviews.title: Easy to manuever
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to maneuver. Just need to know that the brush uses suction air to rotate.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Patterson

customer_reviews.title: not good for carpets
customer_reviews.text: This item has great suction. However the head doesn't move smoothly over the floor. This vacuum isn't good for carpets. If your floors don't have any carpet this will work good. The wand also seemed kind of fragile. I was also disappointed that it came very dirty. I knew it wasn't brand new but the canister still had dirt-not dust in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Stadelman

customer_reviews.title: Spotty functioning vaccuum
customer_reviews.text: Suction power is goos sometimes but not always. If my return window was still available, I would.
customer_reviews.author: helene v waller

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is horrible. I expected better for dyson. Definitely avoid is you have hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Dyson!
customer_reviews.text: It's Dyson, great brand, great products! Works very well! Worth the price!!! Very easy to handle and use.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Portnov

customer_reviews.title: The best brand to buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the stairs and also because I have birds and it sucks up everything I loved it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jose carlos

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Dyson.... it’s amazing
customer_reviews.text: Yeah it seems like a lot of money for a vacuum but it’s the best vacuum you’ll ever own
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: A very good vacuum that has lots of suction power and easy to maneuver and clean.
customer_reviews.author: CortC

product_meta.title: Dyson Big Ball Multi Floor Canister Vacuum, Yellow
product_meta.description: Self-rights when toppled other vacuums fall down and stay down. Only Dyson big ball canister vacuums pick themselves up. Hygienic dirt ejector drives out trapped dust and debris as you empty. No need to touch the dirt. Carbon fiber Turbine head carbon fiber filaments pick up fine dust. Stiff nylon bristles remove ground-in dirt. Ball technology core components are housed within the ball, allowing the vacuum to turn on the spot and follow you effortlessly around the home, without awkward moves. 5 year parts and labor warranty. Dyson received the highest numerical score among canister vacuums in the J.D. Power 2015 and 2017 Vacuum Satisfaction Studies. 2017 study based on 6,965 total responses from 9 companies measuring the opinions of consumers who purchased a canister vacuum in the previous 12 months surveyed in February-March 2017. Your experiences may vary.
feature_bullets: Capacity (volume) - .47 gallon. Self-rights when toppled - other vacuums fall down and stay down. Only Dyson big Ball canister vacuums pick themselves up , Cord Length - 21 feet
Ball technology - core Components are housed within the Ball, allowing the vacuum to turn on the spot and follow you effortlessly around the home, without awkward moves
5 year Warranty - parts and labor. Brush Bristle Type: Plastic. Hose Length:10 feet
HYGIENIC dirt ejector - Drives Out trapped dust and debris as you empty. No need to touch the dirt; Suction Power: 250 AW
Carbon fiber turbine head - carbon fiber filaments pick up Fine dust. Stiff nylon bristles remove ground-in dirt. Filtration : No pre-filter, non-washable lifetime post-motor filter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars676 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
